meanings.definition: Make less sensitive or responsive to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended hyposensitizing the patient's skin to reduce itching.
meanings.sent2: She was hyposensitizing her fear of heights by gradually exposing herself to tall buildings.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the idea of hyposensitizing its sense of smell by wearing a nose plug quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The therapist used visualization techniques to hyposensitize the client's traumatic memories.
meanings.sent5: Hyposensitizing the alarm system made it less likely to go off accidentally.

meanings.definition: The process of desensitizing an individual to an allergen.
meanings.sent1: The hyposensitizing of the patient to peanuts involved gradually increasing exposure.
meanings.sent2: The hyposensitizing treatment helped reduce the allergic reactions over time.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit about hyposensitizing to cat fur allergies had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The hyposensitizing process was like building a shield against allergens.
meanings.sent5: Her success story of hyposensitizing to pollen inspired many others with allergies.
